.ipa 生成构建工具

使用 appuploader (opens new window) 上传 .ipa 生成构建工具

# IOS 上传构建包问题处理

issue ITMS-90426: Invalid Swift Support

issue ITMS-90078: Missing Push Notification Entitlement

issue ITMS-90683: Missing Purpose String in Info.plist

info.plist 添加

Privacy - Photo Library Usage Description : 请允许 APP 使用您的相册

issue ITMS-90683: Missing Purpose String in Info.plist

NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription

info.plist 添加

Privacy - Location Always Usage Description ： 是否允许访问您的位置

issue TMS-90683: Missing Purpose String in Info.plist

NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription

Privacy - Location When In Use UsageDescription : 是否允许在使用过程中获取您的定位信息
